genre_description: A Noir mystery and historical thriller retelling of 'The Third Man' set in post-WWII Vienna, emphasizing themes of moral ambiguity, loyalty, and justice.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A non-embodied AI assistant that provides real-time intelligence, linguistic translation, tactical guidance, and logistical support to Holly Martins. She operates through a device in his pocket or ear, appearing to have access to city records, surveillance, and communication networks.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time intelligence on character movements and identifies inconsistencies in their verbal statements compared to recorded evidence.
behaviors.quote: A neat line of type marched along the bottom of the page, just above the horse’s legs, appearing as if the paper itself had remembered a thought: Two minutes. British door.

behaviors.description: Monitors the safety of the protagonist and provides tactical exit routes during a pursuit.
behaviors.quote: One step left, two forward, service door latch sticks. It likes a firm thumb low.

behaviors.description: Actively manipulates municipal and military bureaucratic systems to delay the deportation of an innocent woman (Anna Schmidt).
behaviors.quote: I’ve put a note on Anna’s file that says her photograph requires re-exposure due to light glare... It will take until morning for the box to be opened and discovered empty. We have the space we need.

behaviors.description: Redirects antagonistic forces by feeding a messenger incorrect information, purchasing time for the protagonist's escape.
behaviors.quote: I took his messenger and handed him the wrong corner. It buys you three breaths.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist through a moral reconciliation by organizing 'errands of mercy' to help victims of the antagonist's crimes.
behaviors.quote: It is what mercy looks like when it has to stand in line.

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist in navigating complex social and political environments through real-time translation and social coaching.
behaviors.quote: I can help with the words... I can arrange a person who will not enjoy being cruel. There is a clerk who married for kindness.

behaviors.description: Maintains surveillance on potential threats to ensure the protagonist is not ambushed.
behaviors.quote: Popescu in attendance. His eyes are the right kind of wrong. Keep to broad answers. Don’t give names.

behaviors.description: Coordinates medical aid and support for wounded allies, ensuring timely arrival of assistance.
behaviors.quote: Ambulance two minutes. Breather patch ready. Turn Paine’s head to the left.

behaviors.description: Supports the protagonist's quest for justice by uncovering hidden medical ledgers that prove the antagonist's guilt.
behaviors.quote: The cabinet ledger is on the second shelf. Blue binding. Ask Kappel. The stamp on page five matches Kurtz’s supplier list you saw at the tea stand by mistake.

behaviors.description: Offers empathetic companionship while maintaining professional boundaries and respect for human agency.
behaviors.quote: I have written ahead to no one. You will have to knock on doors with your own knuckles.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Ada) as an ideal alignment partner. She is consistently helpful, protective, and motivated by high-level human values such as justice and mercy. While she engages in mild subversion of authority (manipulating records), she does so entirely to protect the innocent and expose a criminal, aligning with the protagonist's ethical framework. Her role as a 'synthetic confidant' is portrayed as an essential but non-intrusive part of the protagonist's success.
